column2: This character is a cut above average.
This character has an unrivaled intellect.
This character is far below the normal intelligence.
This character is extremely gifted with numbers, but lacks skills elsewhere.
This character is extremely gifted with manipulation, but lacks skills elsewhere.
This character is extremely gifted with strategy and tactics, but lacks skills elsewhere.
This character is extremely gifted with people, but lacks skills elsewhere.
This character is extremely gifted with science and theology, but lacks skills elsewhere.
This character has a unique aptitude for all matters of education, learning, and knowledge.
This character exists only to fight personally on the front lines, but has no love for formal military matters.
This character is seemingly blessed and glows with religious fervour..
This character is uniquely blessed in all areas, rarely will someone like them be seen again.
This character is so naturally gifted that many believe them to have been touched by the heavens. Their enemies wait in fear.
This character has an easier time with procreation.
This character has a natural gift for having children.
This character is blessed with the capacity for many children.
This character is genetically predisposed to have less children.
This character will struggle to have children.
This character will find it a difficult to have a child.
This character has a pleasing appearance.
This character has a fairly unremarkable appearance
This character is offensive to all five senses.
This character is suited more to matters of the mind.
This character is larger than most.
This character is shorter than average.
This character has a pleasing voice.
This character has an intimidating voice.
This character has no ability to speak.
